title: [BUG] Could not find registered artifact repository / Run with UUID is already active
body:
### System information
- **Have I written custom code (as opposed to using a stock example script provided in MLflow)**: no
- **OS Platform and Distribution (e.g., Linux Ubuntu 16.04)**: ubuntu 18.04
- **MLflow installed from (source or binary)**: pip
- **MLflow version (run ``mlflow --version``)**: 1.14.0
- **Python version**: 
- **npm version, if running the dev UI**:
- **Exact command to reproduce**:
```
> mlflow server --backend-store-uri mysql://admin:pass@my-rds.amazonaws.com:3306/mlflow --default-artifact-root s3://mys3bucket/mlflow-artifacts/ --host 0.0.0.0 &
> export MLFLOW_TRACKING_URI="localhost:5000"
> mlflow run . -P alpha=0.5
2019/11/13 23:27:48 INFO mlflow.projects: === Created directory /tmp/tmp5zbr749r for downloading remote URIs passed to arguments of type 'path' ===
2019/11/13 23:27:48 INFO mlflow.projects: === Running command 'source /home/ubuntu/anaconda3/bin/../etc/profile.d/conda.sh && conda activate mlflow-3eee9bd7a0713cf80a17bc0a4d659bc9c549efac 1>&2 && python train.py 0.5 0.1' in run with ID '08e9146ed554414c8adfa4b7e99af732' === 
Elasticnet model (alpha=0.500000, l1_ratio=0.100000):
  RMSE: 0.7947931019036529
  MAE: 0.6189130834228138
  R2: 0.18411668718221819
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "train.py", line 66, in <module>
    mlflow.sklearn.log_model(lr, "model")
  File "/home/ubuntu/anaconda3/envs/mlflow-3eee9bd7a0713cf80a17bc0a4d659bc9c549efac/lib/python3.6/site-packages/mlflow/sklearn.py", line 200, in log_model
    registered_model_name=registered_model_name)
  File "/home/ubuntu/anaconda3/envs/mlflow-3eee9bd7a0713cf80a17bc0a4d659bc9c549efac/lib/python3.6/site-packages/mlflow/models/__init__.py", line 82, in log
    mlflow.tracking.fluent.log_artifacts(local_path, artifact_path)
  File "/home/ubuntu/anaconda3/envs/mlflow-3eee9bd7a0713cf80a17bc0a4d659bc9c549efac/lib/python3.6/site-packages/mlflow/tracking/fluent.py", line 303, in log_artifacts
    MlflowClient().log_artifacts(run_id, local_dir, artifact_path)
  File "/home/ubuntu/anaconda3/envs/mlflow-3eee9bd7a0713cf80a17bc0a4d659bc9c549efac/lib/python3.6/site-packages/mlflow/tracking/client.py", line 260, in log_artifacts
    self._tracking_client.log_artifacts(run_id, local_dir, artifact_path)
  File "/home/ubuntu/anaconda3/envs/mlflow-3eee9bd7a0713cf80a17bc0a4d659bc9c549efac/lib/python3.6/site-packages/mlflow/tracking/_tracking_service/client.py", line 257, in log_artifacts
    artifact_repo = get_artifact_repository(run.info.artifact_uri)
  File "/home/ubuntu/anaconda3/envs/mlflow-3eee9bd7a0713cf80a17bc0a4d659bc9c549efac/lib/python3.6/site-packages/mlflow/store/artifact/artifact_repository_registry.py", line 102, in get_artifact_repository
    return _artifact_repository_registry.get_artifact_repository(artifact_uri)
  File "/home/ubuntu/anaconda3/envs/mlflow-3eee9bd7a0713cf80a17bc0a4d659bc9c549efac/lib/python3.6/site-packages/mlflow/store/artifact/artifact_repository_registry.py", line 68, in get_artifact_repository
    artifact_uri, list(self._registry.keys())
mlflow.exceptions.MlflowException: Could not find a registered artifact repository for: localhost:5000/0/08e9146ed554414c8adfa4b7e99af732/artifacts. Currently registered schemes are: ['', 'file', 's3', 'gs', 'wasbs', 'ftp', 'sftp', 'dbfs', 'hdfs', 'viewfs', 'runs', 'models']
2019/11/13 23:27:49 ERROR mlflow.cli: === Run (ID '08e9146ed554414c8adfa4b7e99af732') failed ===
>
> mlflow run . -P alpha=0.5
2019/11/13 23:50:05 INFO mlflow.projects: === Created directory /tmp/tmpawe4lwat for downloading remote URIs passed to arguments of type 'path' ===
2019/11/13 23:50:05 INFO mlflow.projects: === Running command 'source /home/ubuntu/anaconda3/bin/../etc/profile.d/conda.sh && conda activate mlflow-3eee9bd7a0713cf80a17bc0a4d659bc9c549efac 1>&2 && python train.py 0.5 0.1' in run with ID '33410503b0274593b5b1a6edf5b4dc3c' === 
localhost:5000/0/33410503b0274593b5b1a6edf5b4dc3c/artifacts
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "train.py", line 48, in <module>
    with mlflow.start_run():
  File "/home/ubuntu/anaconda3/envs/mlflow-3eee9bd7a0713cf80a17bc0a4d659bc9c549efac/lib/python3.6/site-packages/mlflow/tracking/fluent.py", line 111, in start_run
    _active_run_stack[0].info.run_id))
Exception: Run with UUID 33410503b0274593b5b1a6edf5b4dc3c is already active. To start a nested run, call start_run with nested=True
2019/11/13 23:50:06 ERROR mlflow.cli: === Run (ID '33410503b0274593b5b1a6edf5b4dc3c') failed ===
```
### Describe the problem
I have two problems: 

1. `Could not find a registered artifact repository for [...]`
2. After repeated runs, now I get a new error, `Exception: Run with UUID [...] is already active`.

### Code to reproduce issue
See above

### Other info / logs
Thanks so much for any tips for troubleshooting!
